summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 15 and 16, Evan's and Blewett's Addition, being the alley from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street, between 6th Avenue West and 7th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103832 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
